text: This was a single-center, investigator-blinded, parallel-group, randomized controlled trial with equal randomization (1:1). Each group was assigned to perform the hip thrust or front squat twice per week for 6 weeks, for a total of 12 sessions. Performance variables were collected before, and after, the 6-week training period.
sentences: This was a single-center, investigator-blinded, parallel-group, randomized controlled trial with equal randomization (1:1).
Each group was assigned to perform the hip thrust or front squat twice per week for 6 weeks, for a total of 12 sessions.
Performance variables were collected before, and after, the 6-week training period.
